info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 10:21PM CST until March 05 at 10:45PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR PUTNAM AND BUREAU COUNTIES... At 1021 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ladd, or near Peru, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Putnam and Bureau Counties, including the following locations... Seatonville, Spring Valley Airport, Cherry, Mark, Standard, Coal Hollow, Ottville, Kasbeer, Manlius and Van Orin. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
